name: Projecto

problemSolved: Finding the right teammates and networking opportunities
impact: Faster onboarding and better collaboration for students and professionals

name: OnlyICanWatch

name: Authify

name: RateSpace
problemSolved: Need for authentic user reviews and ratings
impact: Trustworthy reviews and better user experience

name: Resumo

impact: Better resume quality and higher job application success rates
